title: 82/294/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 April 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Quanta Ray - Nd: YAG Laboratory Laser System, model DCR-1A', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 April 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Quanta Ray - Nd: YAG Laboratory Laser System, model DCR-1A', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/294/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Quanta Ray - Nd: YAG Laboratory Laser System, model DCR-1A', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 5 October 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 April 1982.
For the Commission
